title: Galactic Civilizations® II: Ultimate Edition

notes: shows many errors at launch but game runs well. Mouse lags horribly -- use hardware mouse from game options. There's a problem with many fonts -- letters are 'shifted' and it makes them harder to read and looks bad
title: Galactic Civilizations® II: Ultimate Edition

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Iris Graphics 540 (Skylake GT3e) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
Three error popups at start, just press OK to dismiss.
Game starts after that, runs without a problem, but graphics are wonky on the text boxes in-game. Tried to install new fonts without noticeable change.
